p: Receptor PDB structures of the SARS-CoV-2 M pro (PDB ID: 6LU7, Resolution: 2.16 Å; Jin et al., 2020), SARS-CoV-2 S-protein (PDB ID: 6W41, Resolution: 3.08 Å; Yuan et al., 2020) and Human ACE2 (PDB ID: 1R42, Resolution: 2.20 Å; Towler et al., 2004) protein molecules were retrieved from protein data bank (PDB: www.rcsb.org). Protein molecules were prepared by removing water molecules and cofactors, adding polar H bonds and charges using ADT (Morris et al., 2009).
